Package org.mitre.synthea.world.concepts

Class GrowthChart

java.lang.Object
org.mitre.synthea.world.concepts.GrowthChart
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class GrowthChart
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Represents a growth chart for a particular measure.

  • Constructor Details

    • GrowthChart

      public GrowthChart​(GrowthChart.ChartType chartType, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String>>> rawChart)
      Construct a new GrowthChart.
      Parameters:
      chartType - What kind of chart it is.
      rawChart - One of the raw HashMaps pulled from the JSON file.

  • Method Details

    • lookUp

      public double lookUp​(int ageInMonths, java.lang.String gender, double percentile)
      Lookup and calculate values from the CDC growth charts, using the LMS values to calculate the intermediate values. Reference : https://www.cdc.gov/growthcharts/percentile_data_files.htm
      Parameters:
      gender - "M" | "F"
      ageInMonths - 0 - 240
      percentile - 0.0 - 1.0
      Returns:
      The height (cm) or weight (kg) or BMI

    • percentileFor

      public double percentileFor​(int ageInMonths, java.lang.String gender, double value)
      Given a value, find the percentile of the individual based on sex and age in months.
      Parameters:
      gender - "M" | "F"
      ageInMonths - 0 - 240
      value - the weight, height or BMI
      Returns:
      0 - 1.0

    • calculateZScore

      public static double calculateZScore​(double percentile)
      Z is the z-score that corresponds to the percentile. z-scores correspond exactly to percentiles, e.g., z-scores of: -1.881, // 3rd -1.645, // 5th -1.282, // 10th -0.674, // 25th 0, // 50th 0.674, // 75th 1.036, // 85th 1.282, // 90th 1.645, // 95th 1.881 // 97th
      Parameters:
      percentile - 0.0 - 1.0
      Returns:
      z-score that corresponds to the percentile.

    • zscoreToPercentile

      public static double zscoreToPercentile​(double zscore)
      Convert a z-score into a percentile.
      Parameters:
      zscore - The ZScore to find the percentile for
      Returns:
      percentile - 0.0 - 1.0

    • loadCharts

      public static java.util.Map<GrowthChart.ChartType,​GrowthChart> loadCharts()
      Load all of the charts in the cdc_growth_charts.json file
      Returns:
      a map of chart type to growth chart
